description: The order, for Braintree and Witham, will come into force on Friday and last until Sunday.
title: Dispersal order for Braintree to prevent car cruising
title_page: Dispersal order for Braintree to prevent car cruising - BBC News
maintext:
Police are due to enforce a dispersal order to prevent what they described as "reckless and illegal activity" from a planned car cruise event.
Essex Police said the order would run from 17:00 GMT on Friday to 06:00 on Sunday in Braintree.
Key stretches include the A131 and A120 as well as all of Braintree and Witham towns.
Insp Phil Jackson said: "We never use these powers lightly but reckless and dangerous behaviour from drivers who are part of such events will not be tolerated and will be dealt with robustly."
